title: Sanitation permits; transfer
context: [§321-11.51] Sanitation permits; transfer. Sanitation permits that have not expired as of July 2, 1997, shall be transferable upon the sale of a food establishment; provided that such transfers are subject to the new owner agreeing to abide by the compliance schedule of the department of health. [L 1997, c 334, pt of §1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 2, 1997,&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this Act&rdquo;.
